languages.text:
Any attacks from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//
languages.original_text:
Дружеские атаки не могут попасть в союзников. Проверки навыков против негативных эффектов способностей союзников всегда успешны.{br}
<align="center"> ///Благодеяние — Радикал -//

traits.locale_text:
Any "friendly fire" attacks from allies that can be dodged will be dodged by allies. Any "friendly fire" ability from allies that has a resistance test will be resisted by allies. {br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Zealot -//

Any attacks from allies that may hit other allies will be dodged if possible. Any allied ability that may target an ally and has a resistance test will be resisted by allies. {br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Zealot -//

Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

languages.text:
Существа {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от атак союзников, которые могут в них попасть, если это возможно, и успешно проходят {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверки на сопротивление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностям{/g} союзников, которые могут их затронуть и предполагают выполнение проверки. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — апологет -//

Allen {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Angriffen{/g} von Verbündeten, die andere Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} könnten, wird nach Möglichkeit {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} von Verbündeten, die andere Verbündete betreffen und mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} verbunden sind, widerstehen Verbündete. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Allen Angriffen von Verbündeten, die andere Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} könnten, wird bei Möglichkeit {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g}. Allen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Verbündeter, die auch auf Verbündete abzielen können und mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} verbunden sind, widerstehen Verbündete. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer -//

languages.text:
Dans la mesure du possible, les attaques des alliés susceptibles de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} d'autres alliés sont {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivées{/g}. Toute {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} alliée susceptible de cibler un allié et qui s'accompagne d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} peut faire l'objet de résistance de la part des alliés. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote -//
languages.original_text:
Any attacks from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Dans la mesure du possible, les attaques des alliés susceptibles de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} d'autres alliés sont {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivées{/g}. Toute {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} alliée susceptible de cibler un allié et qui s'accompagne d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} peut faire l'objet de résistance de la part des alliés. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote -//

languages.text:
当盟友发动攻击，可能会{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}其他盟友时，只要这些攻击可以{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，就一定会被其他盟友闪避。当某个盟友施展的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以以盟友为目标，而且需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，所有受影响的盟友会自动抵抗此能力。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者 -//
languages.original_text:
Any attacks from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
当盟友发动攻击，可能会{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}其他盟友时，只要这些攻击可以{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，就一定会被其他盟友闪避。当某个盟友施展的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以以盟友为目标，而且需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，所有受影响的盟友会自动抵抗此能力。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者 -//

languages.text:
Todos los ataques de aliados que puedan {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} en otros aliados serán {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivados{/g} si es posible esquivarlos. Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de aliados que pueda afectar a un aliado y tenga una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} será resistida por los aliados.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático -//
languages.original_text:
Any attacks from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Todos los ataques de aliados que puedan {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} en otros aliados serán {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivados{/g} si es posible esquivarlos. Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de aliados que pueda afectar a un aliado y tenga una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} será resistida por los aliados.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático -//

languages.text:
他の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する可能性のある味方からの攻撃は、可能なら{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}される。味方をターゲットする可能性があり、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う味方{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}に対して、味方は抵抗するようになる。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者-//
languages.original_text:
Any attacks from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
他の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する可能性のある味方からの攻撃は、可能なら{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}される。味方をターゲットする可能性があり、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う味方{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}に対して、味方は抵抗するようになる。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者-//

languages.text:
Dost birimlerce yapılan ve diğer dost birimlere {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurabilecek{/g} her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}saldırıdan{/g} mümkünse {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınılır{/g}. Dost birimler, bir dost birimi hedef alabilecek ve {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} sahip her türlü dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetine{/g} direnç gösterir. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Bağnaz -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
